org.dudss.nodeshot.buildings

Class AbstractBuilding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dudss.nodeshot.buildings.AbstractBuilding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractGenerator, AlertableBuilding, Headquarters, NodeBuilding, PowerGenerator

    public abstract class AbstractBuilding
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity
    The basic skeletal representation of a building. All buildings are subclasses of this abstract class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.dudss.nodeshot.entities.Entity

        Entity.EntityType

        Updates the fog of war in a fogOfWarRadius.
        Parameters:
